Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 83rd overall pick, by Malibu in 1968...
Had first career hit on 4/20/1975, off Kevin Bugarin (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/14/1975, off Nick Saez (SHP)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1977...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/15/1984 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
